sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
happens eventually
, se zgodi po številnih odlogih ali težavah.

seg.quote: Rodin eventually agreed that Casson was right.
Eventually they got through to the hospital.

sense.def:
Eventually
pomeni tudi tako, ki se zgodi kot končni izid postopka ali vrst dogodkov.

seg.quote: The three firms eventually became Imperial Airways.
